src:
Pomagal Skomini in osrečil Maribor
Derbi 4. kroga v nogometni ligi prvakov so odigrali v Londonu. Rocchi v eni akciji izključil dva igralca Ajaxa in dosodil 11-m za Chelsea.
07 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Jernej Suhadolnik
LJUBLJANA – Kdo bi si mislil, da bo uvedba videotehnologije še dvignila spektakelsko raven nogometne igre? Videosodnik (VAR) občasno prekinja ritem večera, občasno ga (ne)zasluženo drastično poveča. To se je zgodilo v torek zvečer v ligi prvakov, glavni akter derbija Chelsea vs Ajax (4:4) je bil sodnik Gianluca Rocchi.»Čutim, da bi morali v dveh tekmah s Chelseajem iztržiti štiri točke, ne le eno. V Londonu smo igrali odlično, mi smo narekovali ritem igre, ne gostitelji. Pri izidu 4:2 smo držali usodo večera v svojih nogah, nato pa je sledilo, kar je,« je ocenil 49-letni Erik Ten Hag, ki piše na klopi Ajaxa eno najlepših nogometnih zgodb zadnjih let. In 41-letna legenda Chelseaja? Trener Frank Lampard ni znal pojasniti scenarija za končnih 4:4. »Ne znam opisati tekme. V resnici so navijači videli nor spektakel, ki je navdušil navzoče in tiste pred TV-zasloni. Kakšna tekma! Ne spomnim se veliko takšnih,« je dodal Frenkie.Angleški mladci, med katerimi so tudi takšni, ki so prejšnji mesec igrali proti Sloveniji U-21 v Mariboru in odšli domov brez zmage (2:2), so odkritje klubske sezone. Če so v prejšnjih tekmah blesteli Tammy Abraham (22), Mason Mount (20) in Callum Hudson-Odoi (18), je tokrat končnih 4:4 postavil Reece James (19).
Kritiki uperili prst v Italijana
Večina evropskih kritikov je vendarle uperila prst v nekoga starejšega. V ospredju je bil sodnik Rocchi. V akciji, ki se je začela v 68. minuti – pri vodstvu Ajaxa s 4:2 –, se je zgodil niz prekrškov nad Angleži in igranja z roko v kazenskem prostoru, pri čemer je Italijan puščal prednost do konca, nato pa retroaktivno pokazal drugi rumeni karton Daleyju Blindu in Joelu Veltmanu ter še na belo točko. Ajax je z eno potezo ostal brez obeh štoperjev (!) in izgubil varno prednost dveh golov! Udeleženci specializiranih spletnih forumov menijo, da bi moral izključiti le Veltmana zavoljo prekrška in da ni opravil naloge niti VAR.Gotovo bodo svoje povedali odgovorni, kot so kontrolor sojenja na londonski tekmi in člani sodniške komisije. Morda še močneje bode v oči, da je tekmo vnovič zaznamoval VAR, ki je pozneje upravičeno razveljavil angleški gol za 5:4.Nekateri komentatorji so ob tem zadovoljni, da bo 46-letni Firenčan v tej sezoni končal svoj posel pod dežnikom Uefe, čeprav sodi med može v črnem z največjo karizmo. Logično, bi dodali drugi, saj je gradil karizmo v času zloglasnega Calciopolija, ene največjih podkupovalnih afer v zgodovini nogometa, ko je moral začasno v 2. ligo tudi sloviti Juventus, tedaj pod taktirko šefa Luciana Moggija.Rocchi ni osrečil le Juventusa, Milana, Lazia in drugih vpletenih v afero. Pospremil je zadnjo uvrstitev slovenskega prvaka v ligo prvakov: na povratni tekmi Maribora in Hapoela (1:0) konec avgusta 2017. Istega leta je pomagal še enemu slovenskemu akterju. V finalu evropske lige v Stockholmu je sodil Damir Skomina, četrti sodnik pa je bil prav Rocchi in – zanimivo – tedaj Mourinhev Manchester United je ugnal prav Ajax.

He helped Skomini and made Maribor happy
The 4th round of the Champions League football league was played in London. Rocchi ruled out two Ajax players in one campaign and scored 11 for Chelsea.
07 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Jernej Suhadolnik
LJUBLJANA - Who would have thought that the introduction of video technology would raise the spectacle level of a football game? The VAR occasionally interrupts the rhythm of the evening, occasionally (un) deservedly dramatically increasing it. It happened on Tuesday night in the Champions League, the main player in the Chelsea vs Ajax (4: 4) derby was referee Gianluca Rocchi. "I feel we should have landed four points in two games with Chelsea, not just one. We played great in London, we dictated the rhythm of the game, not the hosts. At 4: 2 we held the fate of the evening at our feet, and then it followed, "said 49-year-old Erik Ten Hag, writing on the Ajax bench one of the most beautiful football stories of recent years. And the 41-year-old Chelsea legend? Coach Frank Lampard couldn't explain the scenario for the final 4: 4. “I don't know how to describe the matches. In reality, fans saw a crazy spectacle that delighted those present and those in front of the TV screens. What a match! I don't remember a lot of them, "added Frenkie. The English youth, including one who played against Slovenia U-21 in Maribor last month and went home without a win (2-2), are the discovery of the club season. If Tammy Abraham (22), Mason Mount (20) and Callum Hudson-Odoi (18) shined in previous games, this time it was Reece James (19) who finished 4: 4.
Critics point the finger at Italians
Most European critics, however, pointed a finger at someone older. Judge Rocchi was in the spotlight. In the action, which began in the 68th minute - with Ajax leading by 4: 2 - a series of fouls against the English and playing hand in the penalty area occurred, leaving the Italian with the advantage until the end and then retroactively showing the second a yellow card to Daley Blind and Joel Veltman and another white spot. Ajax lost both stoppers (!) With one move and lost the safe advantage of two goals! Participants in specialized online forums believe that he should only exclude Veltman for the sake of the offense and that he did not perform the task or VAR. They will be ready to say their responsibility, such as the trial controller of the London race and members of the panel. It may be even more striking that the match was once again marked by VAR, which later rightly canceled the English goal by 5: 4. Some commentators are pleased that the 46-year-old Florence will finish his business this season under the Uefe umbrella, though he is among the men in black with the greatest charisma. Logically, the other would add, as he built his charisma during the infamous Calciopoli, one of the biggest bribery scandals in football history, when he also had to reignite Juventus temporarily, then under the tactics of boss Luciano Moggi. Lazia and others involved in the affair. He promoted the last Slovenian champion to the Champions League: at the return match of Maribor and Hapoel (1: 0) at the end of August 2017. In the same year he helped another Slovenian player. Damir Skomina was judged in the final of the European League in Stockholm, while the fourth referee was Rocchi and - interestingly - then Manchester United's Mourinho chased down Ajax.
